SELECT notice_id AS noticeId , notice_title AS noticeTitle , notice_content AS noticeContent , notice_type AS noticeType , admin_id AS adminId , id AS id , nickname AS nickName , notice_createAt AS noticeCreateAt , notice_updateAt AS noticeUpdateAt , notice_YN AS noticeYN FROM tb_notice WHERE 1=1
AND notice_type = #{type}
AND notice_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')
ORDER BY notice_id DESC
